basic.description: This seminar course may cover topic areas including health behaviour change; sport psychology; exercise psychology; food studies; gender, sexuality and sport; neighbourhoods and health; globalization and health; social movements in health; HIV prevention; community-based participatory research; health, risk and the body.  Offered by various graduate faculty or visiting scholars.  One term only. Lectures 1 x 3 hours.
basic.subject: KHS
basic.title: Special Topics III
